dc_description_s: This feature class contains Michigan Geographic Framework v.10 roads that are designed for heavy truck travel in Southeast Michigan. These roads are either all-season (higher weight limits during seasonal load limit periods) State roads, all-season County roads, or intermodal connectors. This feature class does not contain city roads. This feature class does not contain roads with heavy truck traffic that have seasonal load limits.
dc_publisher_sm: SEMCOG, Southeast Michigan Council of Governments
dc_creator_sm: SEMCOG, Southeast Michigan Council of Governments
